law.catch_line: Kentucky Long-Term Policy Research Center -- Status -- Executive director.

text.section: The Kentucky Long-Term Policy Research Center is hereby established. The center shall be governed by a board with representation from the executive and legislative branches of state government and the private and civic sectors, universities, and local governments.
The center shall be an agency and instrumentality of the Kentucky General Assembly.
The board shall employ and fix the compensation of an executive director who shall be its secretary and principal executive officer.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 103, sec. 2, effective July 14, 1992.

metadata.budget-ref: See Legislative Branch Budget, 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 123, Pt. I, 1, (3) at 782.
